original_title: Inversion/Reflection: Turning Balfron Tower Inside Out
overview: Over a period of three years, Rab captured large-format colour transparencies, from the same position in over 120 of his neighbour’s flats in Ernö Goldfinger’s Grade II listed Balfron Tower. The resulting transparencies depict a “fascinating and moving” (Barnabas Calder, 2014) portrayal of a community living with housing insecurity.
title: Inversion/Reflection: Turning Balfron Tower Inside Out
